mapper.insert: insert into `product`(id, name, count,current_count, create_time, update_time) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{count},#{count}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select t.id,t.name,t.count,t.current_count, t.create_time,t.update_time from `product` t where t.id = #{id}

select t.id,t.name,t.count,t.current_count,t.create_time,t.update_time from `product` t where 1=1
and t.id like concat('%', #{id}, '%')
and t.create_time like concat('%', #{create_time}, '%')
order by t.create_time desc, t.id limit ${page.num},${page.size}

select count(*) from `product` t where 1=1
and t.id like concat('%', #{id}, '%')
and t.create_time like concat('%', #{create_time}, '%')
